title: Apple Music is now $2.99 for six months for new subscribers
description: Apple Music has a pretty awesome deal for those who want to try it out. You can now get six months of service for just $2.99. That's not $2.99 per month, by the way, it's $2.99 in total for the first six months. You just need to be a new subscriber, and eligible, though it's unclear what the eligibility criteria might be. It's pretty likely that this offer is, at least currently, limited to the US. We've previously seen Tidal come up with similar offers in other countries, where you'd pay a very small amount for at least two months of service. Anyway, if you've always wanted to try...
excerpt: It's the perfect time to try it out if you haven't already. Apple Music has a pretty awesome deal for those who want to try it out. You can now get six...
text: Apple Music has a pretty awesome deal for those who want to try it out. You can now get six months of service for just $2.99. That's not $2.99 per month, by the way, it's $2.99 in total for the first six months. You just need to be a new subscriber, and eligible, though it's unclear what the eligibility criteria might be. It's pretty likely that this offer is, at least currently, limited to the US. We've previously seen Tidal come up with similar offers in other countries, where you'd pay a very small amount for at least two months of service. Anyway, if you've always wanted to try Apple Music, this is your chance to do it for almost free. Do, however, note that we don't know how long this offer will last, so if you're interested in taking advantage, you'd better act fast. Source
html:
Apple Music has a pretty awesome deal for those who want to try it out. You can now get six months of service for just $2.99. That's not $2.99 per month, by the way, it's $2.99 in total for the first six months. You just need to be a new subscriber, and eligible, though it's unclear what the eligibility criteria might be.

It's pretty likely that this offer is, at least currently, limited to the US. We've previously seen Tidal come up with similar offers in other countries, where you'd pay a very small amount for at least two months of service.

Anyway, if you've always wanted to try Apple Music, this is your chance to do it for almost free. Do, however, note that we don't know how long this offer will last, so if you're interested in taking advantage, you'd better act fast.

Source
